111111111111111 = -1
100000000000000 = -32768
000000000000001 = 1
011111111111111 = 32767

010101010101010 = ######
100000000000000 = -######
|=
110101010101010
!
001010101010101




 011111111111111 = 32767
|000000000000001 = 1 (any number)
----------------
=011111111111111 = 32767 (should be this number or -1)
!100000000000000 = -1 if positive 0 if negative


1111111111111111
